short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the 'For you', 'Trends for you', and 'Who to follow' elements on 𝕏

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience a clutter-free 𝕏 interface! Although 𝕏 claims to optimize unregretted user minutes, there are still distracting and addictive elements on its homepage. Install this extension to remove the 'For you', 'Trends for you', and 'Who to follow' elements on 𝕏.

Did you find this extension useful? Consider supporting me. 

☕ Donate:
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/timjdenQ

I generated my graphics with Hotpot.ai!
